conbody.p: Start Access and then open the file .
conbody.note: When a security warning is displayed, you should you take action. Refer to the part Security and macros.
conbody.p: The Navigation Pane is on the left side and in it are all objects of the database. The objects are divided into groups: Tables, Queries, Forms, Reports, Macros. The pane of the group Tables is unfolded in the example. The navigation pane itself and the panes of the groups can be folded and unfolded.

Double-clicking on an object in the Navigation Pane will open the object and displays the content in a document window. When you have opened several objects then these are displayed as tabbed documents. Tabbed documents
Tabbed documents

You can change this setting through File Options Current Database
Document Window Options
Document Window Options
When you select Overlapping Windows, then the objects are displayed in separate windows, above each other.
conbody.note: If you need more space in width you can fold up the navigation pane. Do you need more space in height, then you can hide the ribbon by double-clicking on a ribbon tab. Double-clicking again on a tab unhide the ribbon.
